name: FUELWARPER
description:
Made by abho (Abhiveer A.) for the SGDA Game Jam: 
"One's Trash is Another's Treasure".


In FUELWARPER you are stranded in a local area of space that humanity used to reside in, with only space debris and junk left behind. Your ship is malfunctioning and runs low on fuel constantly. Luckily, you have a machine that can convert debris into fuel.


Controls

  • Cursor - movement (mouse recommended)
  • Left click - shoot
  • M - toggle music
  • F - toggle fullscreen
